ch.iserver.ace.net
Interface ParticipantConnection

All Known Subinterfaces:
PublisherConnection
All Known Implementing Classes:
ParticipantConnectionImpl, ParticipantConnectionWrapper, PublishedSessionImpl, PublisherConnectionWrapper
public interface ParticipantConnection

A ParticipantConnection provides a logical connection to a participant in an editing session. It allows to send various type of information to the participant this connection is connected to.

Field Summary
static int PUBLISHER_ID
          The participant id of the publisher.
 
Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the connection to the participant.
 RemoteUserProxy getUser()
          Gets the remote user proxy of the participant represented by the connection.
 void joinAccepted(ParticipantPort port)
          Notifies the connection that the join request was accepted.
 void joinRejected(int code)
          Notifies the connection that the join was rejected.
 void sendAcknowledge(int siteId, Timestamp timestamp)
          Sends an acknowledge message to the other side of the connection.
 void sendCaretUpdateMessage(int participantId, CaretUpdateMessage message)
          Sends a caret update message to the participant this connection represents.
 void sendDocument(PortableDocument document)
          Sends the given document to the participant.
 void sendKicked()
          Sends a kicked message to the participant represented by this ParticipatantConnection.
 void sendParticipantJoined(int participantId, RemoteUserProxy proxy)
          Sends a participant joined message to the participant represented by this ParticipantConnection.
 void sendParticipantLeft(int participantId, int reason)
          Sends a participant left message to the participant represented by this ParticipantConnection.
 void sendRequest(int participantId, Request request)
          Sends a request to the participant this connection represents.
 void setParticipantId(int participantId)
          Sets the participant id of the participant represented by the connection.
 

Field Detail

PUBLISHER_ID

static final int PUBLISHER_ID
The participant id of the publisher.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

setParticipantId

void setParticipantId(int participantId)
Sets the participant id of the participant represented by the connection.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id of the participant

joinAccepted

void joinAccepted(ParticipantPort port)
Notifies the connection that the join request was accepted. The passed in port can be used to communicate with the session.

Parameters:
port - the port for the participant

joinRejected

void joinRejected(int code)
Notifies the connection that the join was rejected. The passed in code specifies why the join request was rejected.

Parameters:
code - the error code

getUser

RemoteUserProxy getUser()
Gets the remote user proxy of the participant represented by the connection.

Returns:
the remote user proxy of the participant represented by the connection

sendDocument

void sendDocument(PortableDocument document)
Sends the given document to the participant. This method is typically called after a user joins a session to send the initial document.

Parameters:
document - the document content represented as PortableDocument

sendRequest

void sendRequest(int participantId,
                 Request request)
Sends a request to the participant this connection represents.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant that created the operation
request - the request to be sent to the participant

sendCaretUpdateMessage

void sendCaretUpdateMessage(int participantId,
                            CaretUpdateMessage message)
Sends a caret update message to the participant this connection represents.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant that created the caret update
message - the CaretUpdateMessage to send

sendAcknowledge

void sendAcknowledge(int siteId,
                     Timestamp timestamp)
Sends an acknowledge message to the other side of the connection. The acknowledge message tells the other side the number of operations processed by the local side. This can be used to drop acknowledged messages by the other side.

Parameters:
siteId - the site id of the sender
timestamp - the current timestamp at the local site

sendParticipantJoined

void sendParticipantJoined(int participantId,
                           RemoteUserProxy proxy)
Sends a participant joined message to the participant represented by this ParticipantConnection.

Parameters:
participantId - the id of the joined participant
proxy - the user proxy of the joined participant

sendParticipantLeft

void sendParticipantLeft(int participantId,
                         int reason)
Sends a participant left message to the participant represented by this ParticipantConnection.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id of the participant that left the session
reason - the reason code why the participant left

sendKicked

void sendKicked()
Sends a kicked message to the participant represented by this ParticipatantConnection.

close

void close()
Closes the connection to the participant.
